TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelDispatcherCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase>

Docs.summary: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains channel dispatchers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> to manage the channel dispatchers associated with the host. A ChannelDispatcherCollection is created when <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.%23ctor%2A> is called and the collection can be accessed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A> property.
The collection contains <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> objects (and not just instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>) because it is also used by developers who want to keep the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]programming model but replace the system-provided runtime. They derive a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> and extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> (which inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>) by overriding <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.InitializeRuntime%2A>, adding instances of the class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A>.
This class has no public constructors and is not intended to be used outside of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ClearItems() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes all channel dispatchers from the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InsertItem (int index, System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InsertItem(int32 index, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase item) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be retrieved from the collection.
The channel dispatcher to be inserted into the collection as an element.
Docs.summary: Inserts a channel dispatcher into the collection at a specified index.
Docs.exception: The service host associated with the channel dispatcher collection is closed.
The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The commutation object is not in a state

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RemoveItem(int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be removed from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes a channel dispatcher at a specified index from the collection.
Docs.exception: The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SetItem (int index, System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetItem(int32 index, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase item) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be replaced.
Docs.summary: Replaces the channel dispatcher at a specified index with another item.
Docs.exception: The service associated with this collection of channel dispatchers is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
